# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String, text_width=10)
    words = split(text)
    current_line = ""
    wrapped_lines = []
    
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) + 1 > text_width
            push!(wrapped_lines, current_line.rstrip())
            current_line = word
        else
            if !isempty(current_line)
                current_line *= " " * word
            else
                current_line = word
            end
        end
    end
    
    push!(wrapped_lines, current_line.rstrip())
    return wrapped_lines
end

# Example
println(wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines"))
```
